page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: About 60 percent of the children at the school are members of either The Girl's Brigade or The Boy's Brigade, both organizations are affiliated to the church.The girls meet on Mondays and the boys on Wednesdays in the Church hall where they participate in physical exercise, drama,handwork and various other activities.Teenagers tend to opt out of these organizations but become involved in the Youth Club, Young Farmers, Badminton Club,Scott- ish Country Dancing or Drama Group who present excellent productions twice a year. These activities all take place in the village hall in Braco,just 2km from Greenloaning.Older people also belong to the last two groups and to the Bowling Club which attracts many young people too.Women are catered for particularly by the S.W.R.I. and the Woman's Guild.
